items.title: The Best Dividend Stocks I'd Buy Right Now
items.author: Selena Maranjian
items.description: The article explores promising dividend-paying stocks and ETFs, highlighting companies like Pfizer, Caterpillar, UPS, and Chevron as potential long-term investment options with attractive dividend yields.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: High dividend yield (7.1%), growing dividend, poor stock performance, but promising drug pipeline and low P/E ratio
Solid long-term performance, above-average dividend yield, consistent dividend growth
High dividend yield (6.5%), modest stock growth, potential challenges from e-commerce dynamics
Strong dividend yield (4.78%), growing dividend, impressive stock growth, diversified energy operations
